inline self &Vector::operator=(const value_type &v)
template<class V,class A> inline self &Vector::operator=(      list<V,A> &x)

Assignment Operator

Returns

A reference to the current object.

Remarks

This sets this object (on the left-hand-side of the operator) to the value given on the right of the operator.
